dcterms:description: CLEVR is a synthetic but realistic VQA dataset that encourages discrete reasoning approaches through its inclusion of functional program annotations that model the logic of each question. The dataset consists of 100k images and 1 million question/answer pairs and has been carefully calibrated to avoid exploitable biases. Over 850k of these questions are unique. Images are high quality 3D Blender renders of scenes containing geometric objects of various shapes, sizes, colors, textures, and materials.
dcterms:title: CLEVR

dcterms:description: The reverse Polish notation (RPN) expression evaluation dataset is introduced to motivate additional supervision in higher level learning tasks. The dataset consists of 100k train, 5k validation, and 20k test expressions with n = 10, where each expression is a sequence of tokens corresponding to a valid expression in reverse Polish notation.
dcterms:title: RPN (Reverse Polish Notation)
